java.lang.Object
org.ants.jndd.diagram.NDD

      Parameters:
      field - The field that the node branches on.
      edges - Edges of the node.

  • Method Details

    • initNDD

      public static void initNDD(int nddTableSize, int bddTableSize, int bddCacheSize)
      Init the NDD engine.
      Parameters:
      nddTableSize - The max size of ndd node table.
      bddTableSize - The max size of bdd node table.
      bddCacheSize - The max size of bdd operation cache.

    • initNDD

      public static void initNDD(int nddTableSize, int nddCacheSize, int bddTableSize, int bddCacheSize)
      Initialize the NDD engine with user-defined cache size.
      Parameters:
      nddTableSize - The max size of ndd node table.
      nddCacheSize - The size of ndd cache (default 10000).
      bddTableSize - The max size of bdd node table.
      bddCacheSize - The max size of bdd operation cache.

    • declareField

      public static int declareField(int bitNum)
      Declare a new field. This method only stores the bit number. Call generateFields() after all fields are declared to create BDD variables.
      Parameters:
      bitNum - The number of bits in the field.
      Returns:
      The id of the field.

    • generateFields

      public static void generateFields()
      Generate all fields after declaration. This method creates shared BDD variables and assigns them to each field using right-alignment for maximum node reuse. Must be called after all declareField() calls and before any NDD operations.

    • getFieldNum

      public static int getFieldNum()

    • getVar

      public static NDD getVar(int field, int index)
      Get the ndd variable of a specific bit.
      Parameters:
      field - The id of the field.
      index - The id of the bit in the field.
      Returns:
      The ndd variable.

    • encodePrefix

      public static NDD encodePrefix(int[] prefixBinary, int field)
      Encode an NDD of a prefix with no temporary NDD nodes created.
      Parameters:
      prefixBinary - The binary prefix, e.g., [1, 0, 1, 0] for 10.
      field - The field of the prefix.
      Returns:
      An ndd node encoding the prefix.

    • encodePrefixs

    • encodeACL

      public static NDD encodeACL(ArrayList<javafx.util.Pair<Integer,Integer>> perFieldBDD)

    • toNDD

      public static NDD toNDD(int a, int field)
      Convert a BDD (using shared variables) to NDD for a specific field. The BDD uses shared variables [offset, offset+bitNum) where offset = maxBitNum - bitNum.
      Parameters:
      a - The BDD with shared variables.
      field - The field this BDD belongs to.
      Returns:
      The NDD representation.

    • toNDD

      public static NDD toNDD(int a)
      Convert an expanded BDD (with independent variable space per field) back to NDD. The input BDD uses variables in expanded space: - Field 0: vars [0, bitNum0) - Field 1: vars [bitNum0, bitNum0+bitNum1) - etc. This method recursively decomposes the BDD by field boundaries and replaces variables back to shared variable space.
      Parameters:
      a - The BDD with expanded (independent) variable space.
      Returns:
      The NDD representation with shared variables.

    • toArray

      public static ArrayList<int[]> toArray(NDD curr)

    • toBDD

      public static int toBDD(NDD root)
      Convert NDD to BDD. In shared variable mode, each field's edge BDD needs to be replaced to use independent variable space before AND-ing together. Variable mapping: - Field i uses shared vars [offset_i, offset_i + bitNum_i) where offset_i = maxBitNum - bitNum_i - In the output BDD, field i uses vars [cumulative_i, cumulative_i + bitNum_i) where cumulative_i = sum of bitNums for fields 0 to i-1
      Parameters:
      root - The NDD root node.
      Returns:
      The BDD representation with independent variable space per field.

    • mk

      public static NDD mk(int field, HashMap<NDD,Integer> edges)
      Create or reuse an NDD node. Note that, one should ref all bdd labels in edges before invoking mk.
      Parameters:
      field - The field of the ndd node.
      edges - All the edges of the ndd node.
      Returns:
      The ndd node.
